thread.title: BACKFIRE ALERT: Dana Loesch whomps troll with his own hate, collects his Leftist tears
thread.title_full: BACKFIRE ALERT: Dana Loesch whomps troll with his own hate, collects his Leftist tears

author: Sam J.
title: BACKFIRE ALERT: Dana Loesch whomps troll with his own hate, collects his Leftist tears
text:
BACKFIRE ALERT: Dana Loesch whomps troll with his own hate, collects his Leftist tears Posted at 4:20 pm on February 2, 2017 by Sam J. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Any time you’re on Twitter and you want to see the worst trolls, just visit Dana’s timeline. There are few women who make the trolls as nutty as she does, which is really just gravy for those of us at Twitchy who get to laugh at AND mock-write about them. 
Like this guy, Bob. 
Wow dude, that’s rude. . @DLoesch is quite possibly one of the most dangerous Americans alive today. Spread the word #DanaLoeschForLegalizedMurder 
— NotBob McBob (@BobMcLotsONumbr) February 2, 2017 
Legalized murder? Huh? And c’mon Bob, that’s an awful hashtag, it doesn’t even rhyme. 
Oh and LOOK OUT: 
— Dana Loesch (@DLoesch) February 2, 2017 Trending
